name: Stickman: Encore
description:
You fight as a stickman named Ara to bring your temple back to life:

Who is Ara: Made something for my stickman named Ara(Have to mention something: character is ageless and has no gender, hence the name Ara, why it looks like a basic stickfigure with no special things like swords, Ara has a special green fire-like power no it's not barf, i am looking at the spam punch key the thing is it is an unknown substance not being fire, but acting like it, another thing he is really janky when moving due to the fact he came to life from a marker
___________________________

- Ara is made by Me

 The concept of this game is obviously a fighting game but here is the catch, it is very much luck based

there is a randomizer that picks numbers 1-3

1 = No Attack, 2 = Block, 3 = Attack
